snippet.title: Showa American Story | Official Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Add to your Steam wishlist: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1687540/Showa_American_Story/

Showa American Story is developed by indie game developer NEKCOM Games. Its Steam version will be published by 2P Games.

SHOWA AMERICAN STORY (昭和米国物語) is a brand new RPG and an enthusiastic love letter to the 80s' pop culture that features a strong taste of B-Movie.

Players will play as Chouko, a teenage girl miraculously revived from the dead, and embark on a journey of truth and revenge across the United States, the country under Japanese "Cultural Colonization" long before a mysterious catastrophic incident changes the whole world drastically, while meeting different people, overcoming difficulties and trying to live a better life in this long post-apocalyptic adventure.

*The content demonstrated in this video is all recorded from the actual game. The current version is still in development and does not represent the game's final quality.

[Title] Showa American Story ( 昭和米国物語 )
[Genre] RPG
[Player] Single-player
[Platform] PlayStation 5 / PC
